author: Jack Rathborn, Jack Rathborn
title: Coronavirus: Raheem Sterling, Gareth Southgate and Joe Root team up with NHS to urge public to stay home
description: England's finest will team up to help reduce the spread of covid-19
content:
Englands elite athletes have combined to boost the NHS in the battle against coronavirus.
The initiative, which involves the likes of Raheem Sterling, Steph Houghton and Joe Root, is designed to help stem the spread of covid-19.
